eGFR Patient Data

Source: R/data-eGFR.R
eGFR_pt_data.Rd

A sample dataset to demonstrate calculating eGFR with epocakir

eGFR_pt_data

Format

An object of class tbl_df (inherits from tbl, data.frame) with 51 rows and 10 columns.

Examples

eGFR_pt_data
#> # A tibble: 51 × 10
#>       SCr_ SCysC_    Age_ male_ black_ height_    BUN_ eGFR_calc…¹ eGFR_ pedia…²
